parameters: Not the kind of Lord that you know of, really...
Do you know of the place named \C[17]Ordowald\C[0]?
...but my knowledge may not be comparable to yours.
Please, tell me what you know.
Fufu, a child who means business, hm.
Well then, let's go over this slowly──
but this is not the main topic, so I will explain briefly.
Ordowald refers to the vast universe we know of.
Many different races live within its skies.
I know that much, at least.
I believe there's no need for further explanation, then.
What we perceived of this world...
is there any problem with it?
I suppose I shall skip the explanations.
...So in other words, Miss Tahati is this world's Ruler?
The one who rules over all of Ordowald?
But I thought you said you were...
For me, I partitioned a smaller world under Ordowald.
Created a world within, if you would.
I-I'm shocked... Is that even possible?
I can't believe it at all.
Nothing is impossible for Magical Girl Twinkle Tahati!
W-well then... Assuming what you said is true,
then why am I within your created world?
I need the help of someone like you.
I just wanted to hear what you had to say.
...I don't understand what is what anymore.
I know it could be a lot to take in at once.
I have plenty of time, it's fine.
Let's talk about the rest later, um──
I'm just an ordinary person── a traveler, unlike
someone of great status as you.
Well, you're not quite ordinary yourself.
Anyway, please relax to your heart's content.
I don't think I can relax even if I was told to...
This place we're in, \C[17]Earthless Ainoa\C[0], is absolutely safe.
In other words, it's okay to just laze around.
please allow me to look around a little.
...Ah, right, I have to remove the trap in the front.
...I haven't fully grasped the situation yet,
but it seems that I am free to act for now...
Let's find out what we have here.
How far have we gotten, I wonder.
You had summoned u── me here.
You have such a good memory, Ino～!
Alright, time to tell you the reason for your calling.
It's a serious issue, so listen real carefully.
I've been serious from the beginning.
You're the one making the mood all funny.
I can't support its foundation by myself anymore.
Unlike Ordowald, this world wasn't created naturally.
Therefore, I need \C[17]Mana\C[0] to sustain it.
And what happens if that's no longer possible?
Parlates, and all who lives within.
...Just for curiosity, just how many residents
More than you could ever imagine, at least.
Though most of them are monster races...
All of them lives on Stars my friends have created.
Yes, though the meaning is purely metaphorical.
Parlates is a world resembling outer space.
That's why the regions and the civilization
There are six major Stars total, each with their own Lord.
There's Tyvar, and Kilma, and also Kann...
I won't be able to remember any of those names.
Anyway, those Lords are my collaborators──
──And I want you to become one of them.
That's why I called you here.
How you did it, and why you chose me...
There are still many questions unanswered.
But in any case, I can see the reason you needed me.
In order to maintain this world, you spread out
the burden you have to bear to others.
My current journey has had no purpose or mission.
For that reason, I am more than happy to cooperate.
If what I do can save someone,
then there is no greater happiness.
I almost believed it'd be a waste.
I don't want you to make such a decision so quickly.
We haven't talked about the most important thing yet.
If you become one of us, a \C[17]Lord of Reason\C[0],
you'd never be able to return to Ordowald again.
Your friends, lovers, family... you'll never see them again.
All of your life will be confined within Parlates forever.
The me right now... I have nothing.
No reason to live, no importance to the world.
Thank you for bringing value to my existence.
I-I'd like to reject your offer...
For me to become a... Lord of Reason?
If that happens, only I cannot return to Ordowald,
Is there anyone else you have in mind?
I was just thinking to myself.
thank you for cooperating with me.
But no matter how selfless you are,
I can't just let you lock yourself in Parlates immediately.
And so, I'd like you to visit the Stars in Parlates first.
That way, you'll get to know this world a little more.
If you haven't changed your mind, after all that...
As a Lord of Reason, you will be entitled to
a Major Star of your own.
There is no doubt in my heart.
I know deceit like the colors of the rainbow.
Miss Tahati, you're a good person.
Someone able to sacrifice yourself to save others──
I sense that kind of will from your heart.
That's the first time I've heard that from anyone myself.
I'll guide you onto your first journey.
Think of it as your home.
You were investigating an earthquake-like tremor.
I had a bad feeling, so...
It was nothing, so don't worry.
We got your Mana Vessel for you.
I see the two Lords of Reason have──
Which star is this Vessel from?
Ah, um, we did meet both Valco and Muracca,
but Talvirar's Mana Vessel hasn't gathered
Talvirar should have high Mana density, though.
The star's been rough these days.
Muracca should report the situation later.
At least, she told us she'd do that.
Well then, thank you for your hard work this time.
So, where do we go next?
But since you've come home, why not rest
before you go to your next destination?
I've been meaning to meet someone, myself...
Oh my, Ino, you look cute today too!
I'll take you up on that offer.
So, where do we go next?
Right, your next destination will be──
Before that, may I ask something?
After I went to various places, I became curious.
Aren't you a little too late to ask this?
No, it's great! After all, you tried to become
a Lord of Reason without even knowing anything.
Well, that may have been premature.
Though, there is no change in my decision itself.
We talked about this. Parlates resembles the Universe.
If you become a Lord of Reason, you will never
be able to return to your original world...
No, this time I'd like to go into more detail...
about the stars' characteristics, that is.
This world was created by you, yes?
So, do you create all the stars and life, too?
That is false. For the stars, I kind of...
I feel like that contradicts your story about
being the creator of this world...
I am definitely the one who created this space.
It's just that there was nothing here.
There was an abundance of Mana here──
However, the attributes had no influence here.
It's like there's no natural environment.
Even with Mana, no one can survive here.
Could it be that such a place was converted into Parlates?
I covered up this space, provided it attributes...
and little by little, the space enriches with nature.
So that's how the stars and life here are born?
But Miss Tahati, you said that you lacked Mana.
Shouldn't this space be rich in Mana, though?
Oh, no, it means my own Mana is no longer enough
So that's why those with strong attribute influences
I see... It's not like the Lords of Reason
rules over the stars. Were they assigned
It sounds like we're taking advantage of it,
but that is how it works, yes.
In other words... should I become a Lord of Reason,
I'll manage another star whose attributes have
Yep, in Ino's case, that'd be Light.
I'll have the attributes be returned together with
the Mana Vessel and spread it around all of the stars.
I see, so the Mana Vessel has that side too...
Or rather, that's always been their purpose.
Then, are the stars' civilizations and
history entirely irrelevant to their Lords?
I believe each Lord has some influence on the
lives of their residents, but generally, yes.
I've thought of how strange this world was,
but knowing its structure, it now makes sense.
how Tahati created such a world.
Well, because I'm a genius, of course!
Is it really okay to let that go like that?
Then, may I ask you one more question?
About the nature of the power known as "Reason".
I see you've come to know about that, too.
The Reason of Undeath that revives all life,
the Reason of Wings that connects the stars...
And the Lords of "Reason" who governs the Universe.
What connection is there between them?
Gee, how should I explain it...
Heck, the Reason of Undeath's name itself
After all, you die when your Mana's out.
Ah, that's because... well, Mana is required
for the operation of the Reason of Undeath itself.
In the same manner, death cannot be ruled out
unless you have a certain amount of Mana within.
So the explanation that no one dies is...
Sorry that it was an exaggeration.
In truth, it's more like an equal exchange.
...Well, as long as I don't die, I don't care.
Why is there such a thing as a Reason of Undeath?
Was it Miss Tahati who brought it about?
It's to help the inhabitants born on the stars prosper.
It'd be a miracle of miracles to have a world
naturally rise and flourish like Ordowald.
I've... seen too many stars where that doesn't happen.
Of course, there are some problems caused by not dying.
But I'm sure it was a necessary rule in the end.
As for how they're made, you guessed it.
I created every Reason there is.
I see... well, that's to be expected.
A ruler should be able to set rules to her creations.
I did hear most of what I wanted to hear.
Then get back to our point.
With your strength, I think you'd be fine no matter
where you go... then, how about \C[17]Torion\C[0]?
You can't get there with the Reason of Wings.
The Reason of Wings work by believing that you can
go to that place. Therefore, you can warp there
if you've been there before, or if I tell you about it.
Conversely, you can't use it to go to places you
haven't been or don't know about.
In other words, Miss Tahati cannot imagine...
I haven't been there in a long time so I forgot.
Are you still the creator of the world?
You can say that star is out of my hands.
She manages, or rather controls, the entire star.
Aah, she's not really a bad girl, y'know.
She just doesn't want others to interfere
Even so, shouldn't you check up on her
once in a while? Can we even go there
without using a Reason of Wings?
Torion's actually pretty close to Ainoa, y'know.
Can you really just go there just like that
I'll send you halfway, so call me
Let me know when you wanna go.
Okay, let's go to the meeting hall.
Tell me when you are, okay?
Ainoa has facilities to assist your journey.
Check them out, if you don't mind.
We also found the Lord of Reason.
Miss Luora had something for you,
Oh wow, it's already been accumulated.
It contains the accumulated Mana from each star.
Remember when I told you I was recruiting allies
This is the result of that collaboration.
Mana-rich stars naturally produce more Mana.
I want to return it to the world.
In other words, the prosperity of the stars
is the mission of the Lords of Reason...
All the Lords have been doing their duties diligently.
The others must be just as strong, too...
To be able to invite such powerful people here,
Are you perhaps doubting my identity, Ino?
Lookie here, Tahati might be a weirdo, but──
To think Fiede cares about me so much...!
I just happen to be an ordinary magician.
Just a little bit better── a bit closer to a genius.
Can you even say such things about yourself?
And what do you mean a little bit genius...
How about you, Ino? What kind of person are you?
You're not just an ordinary human too, right?
Not just memories. I lost everything...
I vaguely remember being abandoned by
someone akin to my parents at some point.
That's why I cannot see value in my own existence.
Though I say I am a traveler, in reality...
Were you really this pessimistic before?
Is this really the Ino I know?
...For me, you being here is essential.
To have value to someone once more.
However, there must also be someone out there.
Someone whom your existence is most essential to.
So don't give up on yourself.
Please... for now, just enjoy your trip.
You can continue to use that room however you like.
Hey, tell us the destination of our
This place is so boring, that's why.
Truly? Well then, I see that you have become stronger
Speaking of companions, you invited monsters, hm?
I was a bit surprised when I noticed.
Since they're female monsters, they can just
feed on this guy's dick and not care much
They're so much easier to invite like that.
Eh-um, you know I asked you to protect this boy here
from the female monsters lusting after him, right?
Since when did it end up like this...?
Companions don't attack each other, so I'm
I feel like there are monsters that don't work that way...
I'm a little confused as well, but I'm sure
it's a good idea once we got to it.
The guy said it himself, see?
If Ino said so, I don't mind.
However, if you happen to dig up some dangerous one,
I won't stay by and let that happen.
Oh, of course I'm gonna save him.
Let's hope that it won't happen at all, though.
Right── having female monsters as companions actually
allow you to have an advantage like no other.
Through a certain method, they can easily become
far stronger than they are now...
Well, I'm sure Ino won't be adept at it,
but just in case, I'll open a place to do it.
You can ask to the Familiar later.
does that method include me, too?
If you wanna be strong, I can't stop you, can I♥
...Well, let's get back on topic already.
Where shall we go next on our journey?
Using the Reason of Wings, you can go to whichever
And while you're at it, could you get me a Mana Vessel
from the Lord of Reason? Like you did with Ront.
Tell us who they are, then.
Well, I don't know where those two are
Kertailt's Lord of Reason is \C[17]Shining Illusion, Valco\C[0]──
a Ghost Monster, so it might be hard to meet with her.
She's the kind that dislikes being disturbed.
Talvirar's Lord is \C[17]Beast of the Hunt, Muracca\C[0].
She's very cautious, so be careful when you approach.
Both of them have different personalities from Miss Luora.
That sound... and the shaking just now.
Earthquakes don't exist in Earthless Ainoa.
Shouldn't we take a closer look?
Go and enjoy your trip, Ino!
...ah, right. I forgot to ask about that
Didn't she say you should ask a Familiar?
Well, I know how to, obviously.
Just what kind of technique is it?
She said even you can become stronger, right?
If there's anything I can do, I'll do it.
...well, for now let's go ask the Familiar.
I bet someone in the outhouse's in charge.
\C[17]Phantom of Kertailt\C[0] has been added to the Event List.
\C[17]Hunters' Talvirar\C[0] has been added to the Event List.
\C[17]Mana Benefit\C[0] has been added to the Event List.
\C[17]Barbarian Friend\C[0] has been added to the Event List.
When we first met, I was so at peace.
I hope the world is still safe
the next time I use this.
Miss Tahati, this might seem persistent...
But is there really no way for
the Lords of Reason to leave Parlates?
If there's someone on Ordowald's side
who can observe the Lord of Reason,
then we can get it going if we can
and the times of each world is different...
It just doesn't make sense when we
Did you really say that to her?
If you lied, that'd have given you
Besides, I don't want to lie anymore
than I want to break that promise.
Is there really no better way...
I know exactly what Luora's doing
but saying it out loud is...
I can't procure protection on the same
level as Tyvar's, but at least I can protect
Also, I have my ways to contact Luora.
Right now, I asked her to move
It's reassuring, but... it's also worrying.
I told her to run away immediately if she was in
danger, but she has a strong sense of justice.
It's fine── I'll protect her, after all.
Like hell'd she lose to Kaamos.
Miss Tahati, please tell us where Kaamos is.
I'll guide you to her location.
I heard that you'd like to talk about the future.
What is it that I should do?
Y'know, I was going to ask the same question
What will Ino do from now on, hm?
Or... will you become a Lord of Reason?
I thought the Lords of Reason are abolished.
I did say that at the Convergence of Reason,
but that's a little too far ahead.
In order to judge whether Parlates has truly
become independent, we must look at the long term.
But it's no longer an important role, right?
To forfeit the right to leave this world
just for something like that is...
...I wonder if Kaamos has returned safely.
As I've said before, time flows differently
between the two worlds, so I cannot tell
Which means you'll be able to tell
Once I'm able to confirm Kaamos's existence──
The matter will be well and truly settled.
If Kaamos were able to return, would it be
possible to travel back and forth
As long as you and \N[10] are here.
──Well, in any case, I'll definitely make it
happen. I can finally concentrate on this problem
Ino, what'll you do in the end?
I will not become a Lord of Reason.
I'm sorry for making you worry about it, too.
But I have no intention of leaving just yet.
I want to continue traveling a little more, and──
I want to find a way to go back and forth
Please let me know if there is anything I can do.
I will cooperate as much as possible.
I'll rely on you as much as you want.
You said you want to travel a little
longer, but we went to most of the places
Ah, hmm... is that really so?
Miss Tahati, do you think so, too?
Since you've been to all of the major stars,
In truth, there's always something out there.
Unexplored lands where nobody knows about!
By nobody, does that include you?
The Attribute Devourer that blew up from everyone's
power brought about changes to a certain place...
Around where the Devourer used to be.
A strange space is seeping out of it.
Luora seems to recognize it and
has dubbed it a Memory Space.
In any cases, since everyone has free time,
the Lords of Reason are investigating.
Won't you come by too, Ino?
Ah, so everyone else is coming too?
Of course I'm happy to join in.
Well, I'll be waiting there, okay?
Come by when you're ready, alright?
If you have somewhere else you want to go,
It's okay if you look around over there, too.
\C[17]Seven-Colored Aftermath\C[0] has been added to the Event List.
All of them are blank, though...
There is a nice scent lingering about.

events.name: 下からのみ調べられる

parameters: She never goes anywhere outside here, usually.
I hope she hasn't run into anything terrible...
Just wait here and rest a while.
Miss Tahati... isn't back yet, huh?
The protection of the winds on Ainoa was lifted...
I wonder if Miss Tahati noticed it yet.
I'd be happy if you could tell me, Fiede.
You're... going to leave me behind...
Your face when you heard your world was ending
told me everything I need to know.
──So it was my fault after all.
As long as Parlates is in crisis,
I cannot leave this world behind.
On a journey in that world, Fiede.
...I don't think I can leave, Ino.
My nature is that of a Lord of Reason, Ino.
I can't leave unless the world is destroyed.
I didn't betray you or anything like that.
I-it's true that I hesitated for just a moment...
But, when I tried to leave the Wind Furnace,
Tyvar's tale was truly a tragedy.
However, it's not your fault, Fiede.
Besides, I'll definitely find it one of these days.
The way to release a Lord of Reason from this world.
...If nothing else, I'll do it for your sake.
Don't you try to act cool,
you embarrassing example of a human.
You finally got your groove back.
feel lonely when you'd go away...!
How could I ever leave you behind?
I-i-i-if you're going to go that far...
So I'm going to stick around, okay?
Ara, if it isn't Ino and Fiede.
It feels like we haven't seen each other in ages.
It would be weird not to.
A lot happened while you were gone...
I feel that I must ask, Miss Tahati.
Do you know of the current situation right now?
And about Tyvar... I know that, too.
I'm sorry, even though I was there in person, I...
In the end, Tyvar sacrificed his body to protect
his own star. Let us celebrate for his heroics.
the protection of the winds is gone...
If this place becomes devoured by darkness,
bad things will start happening to your allies.
Can't we do the same thing we did in Signine?
If we set up some Star Markers, then...
Ainoa's the star of Dark, so to counteract
Ainoa... is the star of Dark?
Then that means, this star is...
Yes, this place was Kaamos's star.
H-have we been living in a place
Did you ever wonder why the night sky is
...In any case, there is no effective
I'll finally have to make up my mind──
──I'm going to hold an emergency meeting.
Can you guys join in too?
I'll be glad to attend it.
Well then, give me a call when you're ready.
What business do you have with Tahati?
What are you planning this time?
Fiede still trusted in you, Luora.
I was your enemy from the beginning.
MmmmmMAN has it been a while, Luora!
Been looking all over for you!
I've been wanting to see you for a long, LONG while!
Your voice's stupid terrific as always.
And you're the same as ever, Fiede.
If you don't mind, the introductions, uh...
This is Tyvar. He's some strange old man
who comes to hang out in Ainoa sometimes.
Ah, so you're a Lord of Reason.
No wonder. That name also sounds familiar...
I've heard about your successes in the wind.
Right, I was looking for you, Luora.
Luora, everyone's worried sick about you.
Why didn't you come to the Convergence of Reason?
Luora's an enemy! Don't let your guard down!
Though I don't plan to draw my sword here,
The eyes of darkness cannot spy on this place.
As soon as I learned of Kaamos's awakening,
I sealed this place with the power of a thousand winds.
The influence of darkness no longer reaches this place.
This is the center of all known as Parlates.
I don't want it to fall into the wrong hands.
About the eyes of darkness that I was avoiding...
There are but two reasons for your behavior.
Either you were contacted by Kaamos,
or your very self had succumbed to darkness.
Well, the reality isn't that far off.
You're just pretending to cooperate, no?
Were you watching the entire thing, Tyvar?
Just one look is enough to tell, Luora.
Your acting is notoriously trash as usual.
Come on, be more serious, you two.
But the one that takes the stink is definitely Fiede.
...It's embarrassing that I was seen through,
but on the other hand, I guess I can feel relieved.
You don't have to deceive everyone all the time.
Sir Tyvar, you said you were looking for me?
I was following your tracks whenever I have time.
It seems like I've caused you unnecessary trouble.
For now, let's just say I'm fine.
Alright, now for the next part.
And by the next part, you mean...
Why I'm pretending to cooperate, you mean?
I've already told these two here.
Hey, my acting wasn't bad, right?
I want Kaamos to achieve her goal.
However, I don't agree with the way she decided
to go about it. I want to prevent it.
So I pretended to cooperate and listened...
And when Kaamos takes action, I'll stop her.
You want her to do it, but you want to stop her
I won't let Parlates be destroyed.
But... I understand exactly what Kaamos wants to do.
So that means you want to leave Parlates, too?
So you knew of Kaamos's situation, after all?
After all, I came to this world before her.
There's no point in hiding it then.
Um, what do you mean by that?
Have you heard that she is a Lord of Reason yet?
She was later betrayed and became enraged.
Well, that's not a mistake, but...
Tahati made to her a promise.
That she would return to her original world someday.
However, even now, she could not do it.
I need you to know that Tahati isn't the only one
Miss Tahati isn't someone who's capable
However, it is true that the promise was ultimately broken.
Her anger is like the encroaching darkness──
If I had known that that world would be destroyed,
I might have made a different choice.
I... became a Lord of Reason without hearing out
But that means you also want to protect Ordowald, yes?
...There's a grave of someone dear to me there.
Atleast, I know the feeling of wanting to return there,
even if it's just one more time.
What do you mean by that?
Ordowald is going to be destroyed?
That's how the world is supposed to be.
When the old world ultimately perishes,
Even Ino hasn't heard of that.
if they hear about that all of a sudden.
You must also have regrets about the old world, yes?
Luora, I now understand your reasoning in its entirety.
Want me to relay this information to everyone?
It'd be difficult to act otherwise.
If this is kept quiet, I think you might inevitably
come into conflict with Kann and the others...
But hey, maybe that would be fun?
However, don't push yourself more than your limits.
What will you do from here onwards?
You are not yet a Lord of Reason.
Therefore, you may return to Ordowald whenever.
If you intend to journey in this world once more,
I welcome you with open arms!
Hey, my acting was good, right?

シーン『すごくすごい魔女』を閲覧しますか？
\C[17]※The Scene will enter Recollection regardless of choice.\C[0]
私のおっぱいが恋しくなったのね？
素直なイノくん、可愛いわ♥
私を焦らしてるつもり？
そっ、そういうわけでは。
もみもみできて嬉しい？
私のものにしちゃおうかな...
タハティさん、なんだか...
しっとりしてきました...
ええ...汗ばんできちゃった。
イノくんがえっちな触り方するからよ。
イ、イノくん...実は責めるのも好き？
い、いや...よく分かりません。
君は受け身のままでいて。
その方が可愛いんだから。
そういうこと言わないの♥
こんなのがついてると結構疲れるのよ。
イノくん、おっぱいを支える係にならない？
なってくれたら助かるんだけどなあ。
おちんちんが元気になっちゃってるわ。
次は私が触ってあげましょうか？
シーン『魔女は無垢を摘む』を閲覧しますか？
\C[17]※The Scene will enter Recollection regardless of choice.\C[0]
分かりやすいんだから♥
挟まれてもみもみされるの、気持ちいい？
まあ、聞かなくても分かるんだけど。
君は快感を受け入れることすら恥ずかしがるわよね。
そういうところも可愛いわ♥
オルドワルドに帰すのが惜しくなるわね...
シーン『魔女は若芽を弄ぶ』を閲覧しますか？
\C[17]※The Scene will enter Recollection regardless of choice.\C[0]
イノくんのおちんちんは膨らんでも可愛らしいわ。
おかげでついつい虐めたくなるの...♥
